title: Torey Lovullo: 'I love the Boston Red Sox,' but would covet managerial job elsewhere
text:
Published By: Boston Herald Sports - Today 
CLEVELAND -- Torey Lovullo has two more days to answer questions as the interim manager of the Boston Red Sox. And then reality settles in.T...
